amendatorysection.catchline: Records; statement of fees collected; refund; when required.
amendatorysection.para: The fee for procuring employment or help in all cases shall be clearly set out in the records provided for in section 48-508. The record shall plainly show the amount of the registration fee and all commissions and expenses or compensations whatsoever to such private employment agency for procuring employment or help. In case the party paying such fee fails to obtain employment specified, such private employment agency shall repay the same to such person upon demand being made therefor.
